H2: La rotación de fotos se ha hecho fácil con nosotros, comience por subir su archivo a continuación
TITLE: Voltear imagen - voltear imagen en línea - safeimagekit
META: ¿Buscas un flipper de imágenes de alta calidad? Bueno, entonces estás en el lugar correcto. Nuestra herramienta de imagen voltear en línea es extremadamente segura, fácil de usar y súper rápida.

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Nuestra herramienta de volteo de imágenes voltea las imágenes conservando su calidad.
Ninguno de sus datos se envía a nuestros servidores, todas las operaciones se realizan en el propio navegador. Esto nos permite estar 100% seguros para nuestros usuarios
Nuestra herramienta de volteo de imágenes funciona en casi todos los tipos de navegadores y dispositivos.
Nuestra herramienta para voltear imágenes es muy fácil de entender, no se necesita un profesional para trabajar en nuestra herramienta.
Nuestra herramienta para voltear imágenes es completamente gratuita, puedes usar todas nuestras herramientas sin pagar un solo centavo
Nuestra herramienta de volteo de imágenes está completamente basada en el navegador y no se requiere ningún software adicional para descargarse en su dispositivo.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: Cómo voltear una imagen
steps: Sube el archivo de imagen o haz clic en la flecha desplegable y selecciona Dropbox/Google Drive para seleccionar el archivo y voltearlo.
Ajuste los parámetros necesarios para una mejor calidad de imagen.
Pulsa la opción «Vista previa» para ver los cambios realizados.
Guarde los cambios realizados en el archivo de imagen.
¡¡Hurra! la imagen está lista para usarse.

FAQ.question: Is it safe to allow access to my drive?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it is absolutely safe to allow and give us access to your drive. We won't be making any changes to your site and your dfiles will be safe with you.

FAQ.question: How can I upload files from my drive/dropbox?
FAQ.answer: Click on the drop down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive. Select the Google account from where you want to link your drive. Now you can select the files that you want to upload.

FAQ.question: What are the features offered by the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com while, flipping an image?
FAQ.answer: Image flipper from safeimagekit.com offers versatile features while flipping an image, where we upload the image file in the space provided and edit that image by rotating it to its left or to is its right or rotate the image with a marginal angle.

FAQ.question: How can we rotate the image file to the right, using the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: As a first step, we upload the image file in the space provided. The next step will be done by the website safeimagekit.com where it steadies the image. The user based on the requirement will rotate the image to the right side by inserting the angle on the space provided. After entering the suitable angle, hit the “rotate” button which rotates the image according to the angle. Hit the “save” button to save the changes made.

FAQ.question: How can we rotate the image file to the left, using the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: As a first step, we upload the image file in the space provided. The next step will be done by the website safeimagekit.com where it steadies the image. The user based on the requirement will rotate the image to the left side by inserting the angle on the space provided. After entering the suitable angle, hit the “rotate” button which rotates the image according to the angle. Hit the “save” button to save the changes made.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded image files corrupt after rotating the image files using the image flipper file feature from safeimagefkit.com?
FAQ.answer: No, safeimagekit.com is built with all the latest programs and security features which does not allow the uploaded image files to corrupt. So, the uploaded image files are completely safe and secured.

FAQ.question: Can we rotate the image files which are locked, using the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: No, we cannot upload the image file which is locked as the access to that particular image file is blocked. So, to use the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com we need to upload the image files which are not locked. But the user can check the password finder extension from safeimagekit.com which is exclusively made for unlocking pdfs as well as image files in case the user loses his password for his locked image file.

FAQ.question: Can I use the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com on my LINUX operating system?
FAQ.answer: Yes, the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com can be used on any operating system, even LINUX. It is built with the latest code and features which enables the user to use the image flipper extension on any operating system such as MAC OS, Windows, and Ubuntu, provided there is a device with a stable internet connection. The main trick is that it even works on a slower internet connection.

FAQ.question: Can I use the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com on an iOS device?
FAQ.answer: Yes, the image flipper extension from safeimagekit.com can be used on iOS devices and even on android devices. It is built with the latest features which provide the user to use this extension file on any operating system, all it needs an internet connection and a good web browser.

FAQ.question: What will happen to our progress if we refresh our browser while we are using the image flipper from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: The image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com is not connected to any server out there, so the data which the user is working on will not be stored anywhere and as a result, it will be erased instantly when the user refreshes the browser which he is working on. The image files which are worked on will also be removed after the user exits or closes the tab on which the rotate image page website is open.

FAQ.question: How can I save the changes made to the image file using the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: First, upload an image file that requires a change, then use the “enter the rotation angle” option to change the orientation of the image. Then, use the rotate option to start the rotation, the rotation will be instantaneous and will be finished within a second. Then, use the save option which is given on the right of the website, this saves the changes made to the pages of the image file and then downloads the image file which is modified by using the option called “download”.

FAQ.question: Which are the image formats supported by the image flipper from safeimagekit.com while, rotating an image?
FAQ.answer:
The image flipper from safeimagekit.com supports all the leading and popular image formats out there. These include-
-	Png format
-	Jpeg format
-	Jpg format
-	Raw format, etc.

FAQ.question: Do the safeimagekit.com support pdfs and. word format files?
FAQ.answer: Currently, safeimagekit.com does not support any format save the image type formats. The image flipper feature only works for image files and updates to the website will bring support to all the formats including pdf and. word formats.

FAQ.question: Can we use reflex angle rotations to rotate our image using the image flipper from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: Reflex angles are the types of angles whose degree measurement is more than 180° but less than 360°. Common examples of reflex angles are; 200°, 220°, 250°, 300°, 350°, etc. yes, the image flipper feature from safeimagekit.com do support the rotation of images with reflex angles. Just enter the reflex angle in “enter the rotation angle space” and hit the rotate option to flip the image. Hit the save button after that to save the changes made to the image. Finally, hit the download button to download the image.

FAQ.question: Will my file be saved after I complete working on the image flipper tool?
FAQ.answer: No, we do not send any of your files to our servers all the operations are done on the browser itself therefore all your files are completely safe.

FAQ.question: Do I have to do any additional signup or pay extra to use the image flipper tool?
FAQ.answer: Absolutely not, our tool is completely online and does not require you to share any of your personal information with us, like email id, passwords etc. Our tool is completely free of cost.

FAQ.question: How do I communicate if I face any issues or if I want to give any suggestions?
FAQ.answer: We gladly take in any issue or suggestions offered by all the users, please contact us through our social media handles for more information. Safeimagekit.com is available on all the leading social media websites such as Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn, etc.
